display_long_description:
**Welcome to I Am Mouse: Your Tiny Adventure Awaits!**

**Pick Your Adventure, Little Mouse!**

Choose from the House, Office, or Space and dive straight into exciting challenges and surprises! Each world has a new adventure waiting for you!

[media]

**Cheese Chase: Snatch the Snack!**
Outsmart RC cars and drones to collect the most cheese in this thrilling, high-speed adventure!


[media]

**Aliens on the Loose? Send in the Mouse!**

Join the mouse on a galactic adventure, armed with a space gun to blast those pesky aliens!



[media]
